name: GiftboxHunt
description: A small demo where you look for gift boxes as a dog (symbol of New Year 2018 by Chinese calendar). Default controls are WASD for movement, mouse to rotate camera, E to grab, LShift to run, RMB to dig. Esc to quit the application. Was meant as a quick something New Year related. No asset packs were used besides the Unity engine itself. Sounds came from freesound.org
